      • flush

        public Optional<CounterSnapshot> flush()
        Description copied from class: Counter
        If the counter has no data, returns an absent value. Otherwise, creates a snapshot of the current internal state of the counter builder, resets the counter, then returns the snapshot.
        Specified by:
        flush in class Counter

        public long getCount()
